entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-04-21
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • More precise dependency analysis for generic dictionaries #85184
  • missing help for some SYSLIBxxx The specified 'MarshalAsAttribute' configuration for param ... #85181
  • Deserialising null to JsonNode in nested structures fails in System.Text.Json #85172
    Future
  • CoreCLR tests build fails with `skipmanaged` option #85170
  • [wasm] DebuggerTests.EvaluateOnCallFrameTests timeouts on CI #85168
    8.0.0
  • [mono] Fuse Vector128.WithElement and Vector128.GetElement on arm64 #85166
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: System.DataUri #85164
  • NativeAOT difference in behavior to ILLink with descriptor preserved code and constant propagation #85161
  • how can I run runtime tests with monovm on ios? #85160
  • System.Reflection.Assembly.GetExportedTypes() throws StackOverflowException. #85159
  • Warning for ArgumentNullException.ThrowIfNull when passing a struct #85154
  • [API Proposal]: APIs for working with unix file types #85148
  • Dotnet publish command creates publish folder locally but not in the Azure pipelines. #85147
  • Managed type system casting logic doesn't handle all array variance #85146
    8.0.0
  • [wasm] System.Collections.Tests Unimplemented opcode 2428 .i2 #85145
    8.0.0
  • NativeAOT ComWrappers: support IReferenceTrackerHost #85137
    8.0.0
  • Vector256.Shuffle() returns incorrect result when index is out of bounds #85132

Closed

  • New rule reliability/maintainability: Do await incomplete Tasks before returning and implicitly running other code #85175
  • [libraries-jitstress-random] Assertion failed 'bad 8 byte op' #85058
    8.0.0
  • Test failure Loader\\classloader\\TypeInitialization\\CctorsWithSideEffects\\CctorForWrite\\CctorForWrite.cmd #84007
    8.0.0
  • The Jit will sometimes drop side-effecting unused addresses #84522
    8.0.0
  • The ConvertName function in JsonSeparatorNamingPolicy doesn't handle null value #84830
    8.0.0
  • [JitStress] Assertion failed 'genActualType(type) == type' #85121
    8.0.0
  • [NixOS] ping utility not found #83649
    8.0.0
  • XmlSerializer formatter = new XmlSerializer(typeof(List<T>)) throws exception #85142
  • Unpin C# compiler version for repo #65317
    7.0.x
  • [Proposal] Allow a Brotli compression level between Fastest and Optimal #85138
  • System.Net.Http.Enterprise.Tests build failing in CI #85035
    8.0.0
  • Test failure JIT/Regression/JitBlue/Runtime_56953/Runtime_56953/Runtime_56953.cmd #85135
  • [NativeAOT] System.NotSupportedException: DelegateMarshalling_MissingInteropData in Marshal.StructureToPtr #85086
  • [wasm] WasmBuildTests NativeBuild_WithDeployOnBuild_UsedByVS is failing and will be disabled #84722
    8.0.0
  • Is vxsort with workstation GC a common scenario? #84749

PullRequests

Created

  • Disable gcstress and jitstress for tracing tests #85186
    area-Tracing-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Use unique IL assembly names instead of automatic renaming #85185
    test-enhancement
  • Fix XUnit Log Fixer Irregularities #85183
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [mono] Add metadata update for overrides #85182
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Split assignment rationalization into a separate phase #85180
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Update llvm-libunwind to v16.0.2 #85179
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr, needs-area-label
  • Remove references to P/Invokes and DllImport from resource strings in ComInterfaceGenerator #85178
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 8.0.0
  • [mono] refactor metadata update code #85177
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Fix generic recursion condition when calling DeserializeAsyncEnumerable in NativeAOT. #85176
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, size-reduction, 8.0.0
  • Shared Readme: expand the section on GH Actions #85173
    area-System.Net.Http
  • JIT: use blend rather then repair for profile inconsistencies #85171
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm] System.Net.WebSockets.Client.Tests timeouts #85167
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • Remove common tests from the Roslyn3.11 test project. #85165
    area-System.Text.Json, 8.0.0
  • [mono][jit] Adding Vector128.ConvertXX as intrinsic on arm64. #85163
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono, 8.0.0
  • Drain ConsoleLogProcessor on Dispose #85162
    area-Extensions-Logging
  • [mono][jit] Add Vector128.WithElement as intrinsic on arm64. #85158
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono, 8.0.0
  • Bugfix/30024 problem with concurrency type descriptor getconverter #85156
    area-System.ComponentModel, community-contribution
  • [mono][interp] Fix arg alignment issues when mixing with compiled code #85153
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • [mono][wasm][aot] Prevent llvm from optimizing away stack stores of valuetypes containing object references when they are returned from a method as a scalar. #85152
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • Templatize `enregisterLocalVars` in various methods of LSRA #85144
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Missing overrides in LoggingHttpMessageHandler and LoggingScopeHttpMessageHandler #85143
    area-Extensions-HttpClientFactory, community-contribution
  • [LoongArch64] fix the errors for mod/div after #82924. #85140
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Enable `StripSymbols` by default #85139
    breaking-change, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Add options to optimize for size/speed #85133
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr

Merged

  • [browser] Enable webcil in Wasm SDK #84977
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 8.0.0
  • Ensure ins_Copy, ins_Load, ins_Move, and ins_Store all handle TYP_MASK #85110
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-avx512
  • Fix type initialization ordering under R2R #84275
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Inline function pointer composition details into MethodTable #85141
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fix some issues with null check handling #84523
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Avoid null ref in JsonSeparatorNamingPolicy #85002
    area-System.Text.Json, 8.0.0
  • [wasm][debugger] ActiveIssue for DebuggerTests.EvaluateOnCallFrameTests timeouts #85169
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono, 8.0.0
  • Zlib: Add some protections to the allocator used by zlib #84604
    area-System.IO.Compression
  • add nixos ping executable path #84997
    area-System.Net, community-contribution
  • Use `genActualType` in `LowerSwitch` #85122
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [LoongArch64] fix the arg regs' loop depending. #85085
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64
  • [LoongArch64] revert TARGET_LOONGARCH64 which destroyed by RISCV#84584. #85151
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix enterprise linux build #84795
    area-System.Net.Security
  • Add NativeAOT runtime pack build for iOS/tvOS/Catalyst #85047
    area-Infrastructure-installer
  • Backport #78136 to .NET 7 #84936
    Servicing-approved, tenet-performance, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, source-generator, 7.0.7
  • NativeAOT ComWrappers: extend managed object lifetime based on refcount #85087
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Sync shared code from aspnetcore #85149
    area-System.Net.Http
  • [JIT] ARM64 - Combine 'neg' and 'cmp' to 'cmn' #84667
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Keep instrumentings some intrinsics #85130
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [browser][non-icu] `HybridGlobalization` update string decoding for comparison #85098
    arch-wasm, area-System.Globalization
  • [wasm-mt] A version of LowLevelLifoSemaphore that uses callbacks on the browser #84491
    arch-wasm, area-VM-threading-mono
  • Try to untangle the rid calculation. #82832
    community-contribution
  • Fix reproNative project #85150
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Unsubscribe from codegen-coreclr notifications #85124
    area-Meta
  • [wasm] WBT: Re-enable previously disabled test #85009
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Block Runtime_84693 with the issue #85081 #85123
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • [wasm] Detect constant-size cpblk copies in the jiterpreter and unroll them #85125
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Jiterpreter-mono
  • Lowering Vector512() methods : comparison + shift #84942
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-avx512
  • Jettison vxsort support in the GC when optimizing for size #85036
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr

Updated

  • Support non core types for signature and other type references #85112
    area-System.Reflection.Emit
  • Adding Shuffle(). #85129
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-avx512
  • [ios][wasm] Bump to ICU-72 #84849
    NO-MERGE, area-Build-mono
  • Report -1 for GC.GetGeneration(nongc_obj) and same for GetObjectGeneration #85017
    breaking-change, area-Diagnostics-coreclr, needs-breaking-change-doc-created
  • [browser] Enable threads in Wasm SDK #85109
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 8.0.0
  • Fix GCStress timeouts in JIT/jit64 #85040
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fold IND(frozenObj, CNS) #85127
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Optimize GDV checks for objects with known type #84661
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Avx512: Abs, ceil, floor, min, max #84937
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-avx512
  • Use emit-based invoke for all of WASM including DI #85065
    arch-wasm, area-System.Reflection, tenet-performance, 8.0.0
  • Add a test for `STORE_DYN_BLK(..., IND(null), ...)` #85103
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Use `gtNewIndir` everywhere #84528
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Introduction to vectorization with Vector128 and Vector256 #84115
    area-Meta
  • [HTTP/3] Stress hack for msquic dropping connections #84793
    area-System.Net.Http
  • Enable EVEX feature: embedded broadcast for Vector256.Add() in limited cases #84821
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-avx512
  • [mono][debugger] Improving debugger functionaties #85050
    area-Debugger-mono
  • [Arm64] Replace pairs of `str` with `stp` #85032
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • NoGCRegion Callback #82045
    area-GC-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [MONO] Add JIT_CODE_DEBUG_INFO record functionality for Jitdump #85107
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono, community-contribution
  • Ascii.Equals and Ascii.EqualsIgnoreCase #84886
    area-System.Text.Encoding, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Use Roslyn Source Generator Testing SDK to test interop source generators #84867
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, test-enhancement, source-generator
  • Improve allocations in ReflectionXmlSerializationWriter when serializing primitive types #84474
    area-Serialization, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Interface inheritance follow up #85117
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • Enable ComWrappers for NativeAOT on non-Windows #85000
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Address Sanitizer support in CoreCLR #74623
    tenet-reliability, area-Infrastructure
  • The ConstructorBuilder and MethodBuilder generated parameter should not has default value by default #84550
    area-System.Reflection.Emit, community-contribution
  • [wasm] Use latest stable version of chrome #85114
    arch-wasm, test-enhancement, area-Build-mono
  • Expose setting CPU SamplingProfiler rate #83635
    area-Tracing-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [wasi] implement ICU bundling #85049
    area-Build-mono, os-wasi, 8.0.0
  • [wasm-mt] Support async JS interop on threadpool threads #84494
    arch-wasm, area-Threading-mono
  • [browser][non-icu] `HybridGlobalization` checking for prefix/suffix #85093
    arch-wasm, area-System.Globalization
  • Vectorize IEnumerable<T>.Sum where possible #84519
    area-System.Linq, community-contribution
  • [RISC-V][JIT] JIT/CodeGenBringUpTest #84748
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Almost complete sync of logic for generating DAM/RUC reflection access warnings between ILLink and NativeAOT #84770
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Add TargetHostName to QuicConnection #84976
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Net.Quic
  • JIT: Support some assignment decomposition in physical promotion #85105
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Adding TimeProvider CreateCancellationTokenSource extension method #85131
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.DateTime, 8.0.0
  • DateTimeParse: accept all white space chars in the format string for DateTimeStyles Allow White #85102
    area-System.Globalization, community-contribution, needs-author-action, 8.0.0
  • AssemblyBuilder.Save add custom attributes handling. #84580
    area-System.Reflection, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [mono] fix two call get_default_jit_mm make hotreload work in non default alc #84247
    area-EnC-mono, community-contribution
  • [PERF] Remove pipeline dependencies and steps for running Maui Mobile #85074
    area-Infrastructure
